main.you_may_check_eligibility: You may check your eligibility for the elections by requesting a sign in link. The link will be sent to the email address you have submitted to the Aalto University Student Registry by 15.9.2019.
main.sign_in_using_university_account: Sign in using your Aalto University account.
main.voting_opening_hours: Voting is open between {{ open }} - {{ close }}.
main.result_will_be_published_at: The result will be published at ayy.fi/vaalit

no_voting_right.title: No Voting Right
no_voting_right.lead: Your student number does not have the right to vote.
no_voting_right.body: Please contact the election staff in case of an error.

invalid_saml_response.title: Sign In Error
invalid_saml_response.lead: Cooperation with the authentication service failed.
invalid_saml_response.body: If the problem persists, please contact the election staff.

general.title: Unknown Error
general.lead: Something went wrong for an unknown reason.
general.body: If the problem persists, please contact the election staff.

error.lead: Your sign in link has expired or voting is closed.
error.private_browsing_note: Please check that your browser is not in Private Browsing Mode.

private_browsing_mode.title: You're in Private Browsing Mode
private_browsing_mode.lead: Your browser has "Private Browsing Mode" enabled, which prevents the voting service from functioning.
private_browsing_mode.what_now: Please open the sign in link in a normal browser window.

sign_up.voting_days_are: Early voting will begin on Monday the 28th of October 2019 at 12.00 and end on Thursday the 31st of October at 23.59. The official voting period will begin on Friday the 1st of November at 00.01 and end on Tuesday the 5th of November at 16.00.
sign_up.if_cannot_sign_in: If you cannot access your university user account or signing in fails for some reason, please contact election staff member Annika Mällinen, vaalit@ayy.fi, +358 50 520 9434.
sign_up.sign_in_is_not_active: Voting is not open at the moment.

edari.eligibility: You have the right to vote if you have enrolled in and paid the membership fee of the Student Union. You can sign up to vote by using your Aalto University user account.
edari.late_member_note: If you enrolled in just recently, your student number might not yet be in the list of people with the right to vote. In that case, you will receive a message after signing telling that you do not have the right to vote. A right to vote can be created for you if you provide proof of your payment of the Student Union's membership fee to the Central Office of the Aalto University Student Union.

request_link.ingress: Enter the same e-mail address that you have in the University’s student registry, and we will send you a registration link.
request_link.password_instructions: The password can be delivered only to the email address that you have in the student registry. You can check which email address you have used on the contact details page in WebOodi.
request_link.spam_instructions: In case you did nott receive the link, please also check your spam folder.
request_link.in_case_of_fire: If everything else fails, please contact the election staff of the Student Union vaalit@ayy.fi or +358 50 520 9434.
request_link.election_dates_explained: Voting is open between Tue 15.12.2015 at 9:00-20:00 and Wed 16.12.2015 at 9:00-17:00.
request_link.staff_eligibility_note: Permanent staff of the university are not eligible to vote for student members in the administration elections.
request_link.private_browsing_note: Please make sure that you do not have Private Browsing Mode enabled when you open the sign in link.
request_link.link_has_been_sent: Link for signing in has been sent!
request_link.pls_check_email: Please follow the instructions in your email and sign in.

something_went_wrong.detail: We were unable to send you the link.
something_went_wrong.if_happens_again: If the problem happens again, please contact the election staff of the Student Union vaalit@ayy.fi or +358 50 520 9434.
something_went_wrong.pls_explain: Please provide us with the technical error message:

errors.not_eligible_in_any_election: You are not eligible to vote in any of the current elections.
errors.session_creation_not_permitted: Voting is closed. You can view the date and time for voting above.

sign_out.ingress: You may close the browser window.

profile.ingress: You have signed in with the following information.
profile.you_are_eligible: You are eligible to vote in the elections of your faculty and department.
profile.in_case_of_problem: If there is a problem with your information, please contact the Student Union.

error.try_again: Please sign out and try signing in again.

vote-ballot.title: Vote ballot
vote-ballot.ingress: Choose a candidate from the list.
vote-ballot.registration-note: Your vote will not be registered until you press "Vote" and then confirm your vote by pressing "Confirm your vote".
vote-ballot.about-to-change-existing-vote: You are about to change a previously cast vote. Changes will be recorded after you click 'Vote'.

vote.coalition-index-text: Electoral coalitions consist of electoral alliances and electoral alliances consist of candidates.
vote.if-you-are-eligible-in-others: If you are eligible in multiple elections,
vote.close-window-when-finished: You may close the browser window.
vote.voting-failed-instructions: Please reload the voting page and try voting again.
vote.voting-failed-contact: If the problem persists, please contact election staff member Annika Mällinen, vaalit@ayy.fi, +358 50 520 9434

search.title: Find a candidate
search.browser-search-tip: You can also use the browser's search function.
search.when-no-results: Electoral alliances that did not match your search query are not displayed.

elections.sign_up_please: You can vote after you have signed in.
elections.you_can_vote_in_the_following: You can vote in the following elections:
elections.choose_election: Open the election, choose a candidate and press "vote".
elections.submit_vote_help: Your vote will be registered when you press the "Vote" button after choosing a candidate and then confirm your vote by pressing the "Confirm your vote" button.
elections.vote_is_immutable: A cast vote cannot be changed afterwards.

empty.no_elections_available: You are not eligible to vote in any elections.

info.ingress:
At the AYY Representative Council Elections, you will select the highest decision-making body of the Student Union, the 45-member Representative Council. All AYY members are eligible to vote, meaning approximately 14,000 Aalto University students.
AYY Representative Council Elections Candidate Matcher
info.election_dates_explained: Early voting will begin on Monday the 28th of October 2019 at 12.00 and end on Thursday the 31st of October at 23.59. The official voting period will begin on Friday the 1st of November at 00.01 and end on Tuesday the 5th of November at 16.00.

contact.in_case_of_fire: In case of a problem, please contact
